title: Support the '.displayName' property for the F12 developer tools
body: Both Firefox and Safari support the '.displayName' property in their developer tools. Chrome has partial support (debugger - not yet profiler, but is working on it).

comments.body: After some back and forth about '.displayName' vs. the ECMA E6 '.name' property, etc. etc. (see the Chrome bug for the debate) the Chrome guys have decided on the following algorithm:
Here's the thread for .displayName in the Chromium mailing list https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=17356
